content.question: Two straight roads intersect at right angles. A car is traveling south toward the intersection while a radar-monitored-speed sign is positioned <math alttext="one fourth " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math> mile east of the intersection. The speed sign provides both the distance from the sign to an approaching car and the rate at which the distance between the sign and the car is changing. At a certain time, the speed sign shows that the approaching car is exactly <math alttext="one half " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math> mile away from the sign and that the rate at which the distance between the car and the sign is decreasing is 60 miles per hour. Which of the following is true about the distance between the car and the intersection at this instant?

choices.label: The distance is increasing at a rate of <math alttext="120 over the square root of 3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>120</mn></mrow><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math> miles per hour.

The distance is decreasing at a rate of <math alttext="120 over the square root of 3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>120</mn></mrow><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> miles per hour.

The distance is increasing at a rate of <math alttext="30 over the square root of 3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>30</mn></mrow><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math> miles per hour.

The distance is decreasing at a rate of <math alttext="30 over the square root of 3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>30</mn></mrow><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math> miles per hour.

content.answer: The distance is decreasing at a rate of <math alttext="120 over the square root of 3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>120</mn></mrow><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> miles per hour.
